muhaffidh.caption: Memorize and review Quran efficiently
muhaffidh.description: A Quran app designed to help you memorize and review the Quran in an innovative way.
muhaffidh.tagline: An innovative Quran memorization & review companion
muhaffidh.title: Muhaffidh

quran_android.caption: Read, bookmark, and listen to the Quran on Android devices
quran_android.description: Features include Madani-style pages, gapless audio, bookmarking/tagging/sharing, search, night mode, audio repeat, and translations/tafsir in many languages.
quran_android.tagline: Free, open-source Quran app for Android
quran_android.title: Quran for Android

quran_ios.caption: Beautiful, ad-free Quran reading and listening app for iPhone & iPad
quran_ios.description: From the makers of Quran.com: read the Quran on the go, memorize, and listen to your favorite reciters in a clean, ad-free experience.
quran_ios.title: Quran for iOS (by quran.com)

quranmeet.caption: Live Quran study sessions
quranmeet.description: A platform that connects students with teachers and study groups for one-on-one and small-group Quran learning sessions.
quranmeet.title: QuranMeet

quranreflect.caption: Share reflections
quranreflect.description: A social platform to cultivate a culture of reflection upon the Holy Quran
quranreflect.title: QuranReflect

readtafsir.caption: Search and compare classical tafsirs
readtafsir.description: Read and listen to multiple classical tafsir sources in one place, making it easy to browse, search, and compare interpretations.
readtafsir.title: ReadTafsir

sunnah.caption: Hadith collection
sunnah.description: A hadith library with major collections available online, including translations in multiple languages and search tools.
sunnah.title: Sunnah.com

tafsirapp.caption: Interactive tafsir with multiple sources
tafsirapp.description: A Quran research portal that brings together tafsir, qira'at, mushafs, i'rab, Qur'anic sciences, asbab al-nuzul, rulings, and dictionaries.
tafsirapp.title: Tafsir App

qariah.headline: Finally, a Quran app for our daughters
qariah.name: Qariah

quran-space.name: Quran Spaces
quran-space.headline: Connect with teachers, students, or peers in real time audio and video to read, reflect, and study together.

quran-kareem.headline: Your new gateway to connect with the Book of Allah
quran-kareem.name: Quran Kareem

quran-link.headline: Explore 25+ tafsirs and 100+ translations in one place
quran-link.name: Quran Link

footer.disclaimer: Each application is independently owned and maintained by its developer. For support, bug reports, or feature requests, please contact the app creator directly.

hero.description: Explore unique apps powered by Quran Foundation’s verified content and user features, while your account, progress, and journey stay connected.
hero.title: Connected Quran Apps
